products.title: Origin, Matt Red - Venetian Blind
products.description: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like.

products.title: Primary Red
products.description: Primary red gloss metal venetian blind.

products.title: Ruby Red Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Rich Red Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Quartz Red
products.description: Quartz red texture metal venetian blind.

products.title: Deluxe Primary Red Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: Perfect fit venetian blinds are manufactured from high quality aluminium. Available in 42 colour shades. Deluxe primary red perfect fit blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Passionate Red (7060)
products.description: Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.
